QuestData.Title: Undersea Sanctuary
QuestData.Description: I believe I've located the author of your note, friend.$b$bIt would seem that he is in desperate need of attention if he is to survive.$b$bI shall attune one of my scrying orbs, that you might see him for yourself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Erunak's Scrying Orb to view the location of Deepmist Grotto.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you familiarized yourself with the cavern's location, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: We must make haste!$b$bAs you can surely see, his time is not long.
